title: Encounter at Farpoint
synopsis: The new starship Enterprise begins its mission by uncovering the mysteries at Farpoint Station and dealing with the omnipotent being Q.

title: The Naked Now
synopsis: The crew is infected with a virus that removes their inhibitions, leading to dangerous and chaotic situations aboard the Enterprise.

title: Code of Honor
synopsis: Tasha Yar is abducted by a powerful alien leader who forces her to fight for her life in a battle to the death.

title: The Last Outpost
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a mysterious energy-draining force and the crew must outwit the Ferengi to survive.

title: Where No One Has Gone Before
synopsis: The Enterprise is thrown to the far reaches of the universe when a warp drive experiment goes awry.

title: Lonely Among Us
synopsis: An alien entity takes control of members of the crew, including Captain Picard, as the Enterprise transports delegates to a peace conference.

title: Justice
synopsis: The crew visits a seemingly idyllic planet, but Wesley Crusher faces a death sentence for accidentally breaking a local law.

title: The Battle
synopsis: Captain Picard must confront a traumatic event from his past when the Ferengi present him with his former starship, the Stargazer.

title: Hide and Q
synopsis: Q returns to test the crew, offering Riker godlike powers to see if he can resist the temptation to use them.

title: Haven
synopsis: Counselor Troi is caught in a dilemma when she is faced with an arranged marriage she doesn't want, but must honor.

title: The Big Goodbye
synopsis: Picard, Data, and Beverly become trapped in a malfunctioning holodeck simulation of a 1940s detective story.

title: Datalore
synopsis: The crew discovers Lore, Data's evil twin brother, who has sinister plans for the Enterprise.

title: Angel One
synopsis: The Enterprise visits a planet ruled by women and must navigate the complexities of their matriarchal society.
The Bynars, an alien race linked to computers, hijack the Enterprise to save their dying planet.

title: Too Short a Season
synopsis: An aging admiral takes a drug to reverse the aging process in a desperate attempt to atone for a past mistake.

title: When the Bough Breaks
synopsis: A planet that has lost the ability to have children abducts several children from the Enterprise.

title: Home Soil
synopsis: The crew discovers a new form of life while investigating the death of a terraforming engineer.

title: Coming of Age
synopsis: Wesley faces the entrance exam for Starfleet Academy, while the Enterprise undergoes an investigation.

title: Heart of Glory
synopsis: Worf must confront his Klingon heritage when he meets two rogue Klingons seeking to reignite the old ways.

title: The Arsenal of Freedom
synopsis: The crew encounters a planet that manufactures and sells automated weapons of war, which turn on the crew.

title: Symbiosis
synopsis: The crew becomes embroiled in a conflict between two alien races, one dependent on a drug supplied by the other.

title: Skin of Evil
synopsis: The crew faces a malevolent entity that kills Tasha Yar, leaving the crew to deal with the loss of a valued officer.

title: We'll Always Have Paris
synopsis: Picard reconnects with a lost love while the crew contends with a scientist's experiment that is causing time distortions.

title: Conspiracy
synopsis: Picard uncovers a sinister conspiracy within Starfleet that threatens the very foundation of the organization.

title: The Neutral Zone
synopsis: The Enterprise must deal with a new Romulan threat while also reviving three humans from the 20th century.

title: The Child
synopsis: Troi becomes mysteriously pregnant, and the crew must deal with the rapid growth of her child.

title: Where Silence Has Lease
synopsis: The Enterprise is trapped in a mysterious void, where the crew is subjected to terrifying experiments.

title: Elementary, Dear Data
synopsis: Data plays Sherlock Holmes in a holodeck mystery, but the game becomes deadly when the character of Moriarty becomes self-aware.

title: The Outrageous Okona
synopsis: The Enterprise plays host to a roguish freighter captain who charms the crew while hiding a dark secret.

title: Loud as a Whisper
synopsis: The Enterprise transports a mute mediator to negotiate peace between warring factions, but things go wrong when his interpreters are killed.

title: The Schizoid Man
synopsis: An ailing scientist transfers his consciousness into Data's body, threatening the android's existence.

title: Unnatural Selection
synopsis: A genetic experiment goes awry, causing rapid aging in the crew of a research station, and threatening Dr. Pulaski.

title: A Matter of Honor
synopsis: Riker participates in an officer exchange program and serves on a Klingon ship, where he must navigate their warrior culture.

title: The Measure of a Man
synopsis: Data's right to self-determination is put on trial when a Starfleet scientist wishes to dismantle him for study.

title: The Dauphin
synopsis: Wesley falls for a girl who is destined to lead her people, but her true nature could tear them apart.

title: Contagion
synopsis: The Enterprise faces a deadly computer virus that also destroyed a sister ship, leading the crew to a showdown with the Romulans.

title: The Royale
synopsis: Riker, Worf, and Data become trapped in a bizarre hotel that is based on a poorly written novel.

title: Time Squared
synopsis: The crew encounters a future version of Captain Picard from six hours in the future, and must unravel the mystery before disaster strikes.

title: The Icarus Factor
synopsis: Riker is offered his own command, leading to tensions with his father, who is sent to brief him on the mission.

title: Pen Pals
synopsis: Data forms a secret friendship with a young girl on a planet facing natural disaster, violating the Prime Directive.

title: Q Who
synopsis: Q hurls the Enterprise into the path of the Borg, a terrifying new enemy that could threaten the entire galaxy.

title: Samaritan Snare
synopsis: Picard faces a critical surgery while Riker and the crew must deal with a seemingly harmless alien race that has captured Geordi.

title: Up the Long Ladder
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers two isolated human colonies with vastly different cultures, and must find a way to save both.

title: Manhunt
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi visits the Enterprise, seeking a mate, and becomes infatuated with Captain Picard.

title: The Emissary
synopsis: Worf reunites with an old lover when the Enterprise is tasked with stopping a ship of Klingon warriors from attacking the Federation.

title: Peak Performance
synopsis: The Enterprise participates in a war games exercise, but the simulation turns deadly when the Ferengi attack.

title: Shades of Gray
synopsis: Riker is infected with a deadly virus, and Dr. Pulaski must induce dreams to save him in this clip show number.

title: Evolution
synopsis: The Enterprise faces a crisis when nanites, tiny robots used for medical research, develop intelligence and threaten the ship.

title: The Ensigns of Command
synopsis: Data must convince a colony of humans to evacuate their planet before an alien race, the Sheliak, exterminates them.

title: The Survivors
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers a planet devastated by war, with only two survivors who harbor a dark secret.

title: Who Watches the Watchers
synopsis: A Federation observation team is accidentally revealed to a pre-warp civilization, leading them to worship Captain Picard as a god.

title: The Bonding
synopsis: A boy loses his mother in a mission gone wrong, and Worf helps him cope with the tragedy.

title: Booby Trap
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes trapped in an ancient booby trap left by an extinct race, and Geordi must find a way to free the ship.

title: The Enemy
synopsis: Geordi is stranded on a hostile planet with a Romulan, and they must work together to survive.

title: The Price
synopsis: Troi falls in love with a negotiator who is bidding for control of a stable wormhole, but he has a hidden agenda.

title: The Vengeance Factor
synopsis: The crew mediates a dispute between two rival factions, while Riker becomes involved with a mysterious woman.

title: The Defector
synopsis: A Romulan defector seeks asylum on the Enterprise, bringing vital intelligence that could avert a war.

title: The Hunted
synopsis: The Enterprise captures a dangerous fugitive who reveals the dark secrets of his government's past.

title: The High Ground
synopsis: Dr. Crusher is abducted by terrorists fighting for independence on a planet, and the Enterprise must rescue her without violating the Prime Directive.

title: Déjà Q
synopsis: Q is stripped of his powers and seeks asylum aboard the Enterprise, where he must learn to live as a mortal.

title: A Matter of Perspective
synopsis: Riker is accused of murder, and the crew must use the holodeck to recreate the events leading up to the crime.

title: Yesterday's Enterprise
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a time anomaly that brings a previous Enterprise into the present, altering history and leading to Tasha Yar's return.

title: The Offspring
synopsis: Data creates an android 'daughter,' Lal, who struggles with her emerging emotions and identity.

title: Sins of the Father
synopsis: Worf must defend his family's honor when he is accused of treason against the Klingon Empire.

title: Allegiance
synopsis: Picard is kidnapped and replaced by an impostor, who behaves erratically aboard the Enterprise while the real Picard struggles to escape captivity.

title: Captain's Holiday
synopsis: Picard's vacation on Risa is interrupted by an archaeologist who ropes him into a quest for a powerful artifact.

title: Tin Man
synopsis: The Enterprise is sent to make contact with a mysterious alien lifeform, but a telepath aboard the ship has his own agenda.

title: Hollow Pursuits
synopsis: A shy and introverted crew member retreats into a fantasy world in the holodeck, causing problems for the Enterprise.

title: The Most Toys
synopsis: Data is kidnapped by a ruthless collector who plans to keep him as part of his collection of rare items.

title: Sarek
synopsis: Ambassador Sarek, Spock's father, comes aboard the Enterprise for a mission, but his deteriorating mental state poses a threat to the crew.

title: Ménage à Troi
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi, her daughter Deanna, and Captain Picard are captured by Ferengi who seek to exploit Lwaxana's telepathic abilities.

title: Transfigurations
synopsis: The crew rescues a dying alien who undergoes a miraculous transformation, revealing a new stage of evolution.

title: The Best of Both Worlds, Part I
synopsis: The Borg capture Picard and begin to assimilate him into their collective, while Riker faces the challenge of leading the Enterprise in a desperate battle.

title: The Best of Both Worlds, Part II
synopsis: The crew races against time to save Captain Picard from the Borg and prevent the destruction of Earth.

title: Family
synopsis: Picard returns to Earth to recover from his ordeal with the Borg and reconnects with his estranged brother.

title: Brothers
synopsis: Data is compelled to reunite with his creator, Dr. Soong, who has important information for him and his brother Lore.

title: Suddenly Human
synopsis: The crew discovers a human boy who has been raised by aliens, leading to a struggle over his future.

title: Remember Me
synopsis: Dr. Crusher is trapped in a rapidly shrinking universe and must find a way to escape before it disappears entirely.

title: Legacy
synopsis: The crew visits the home planet of Tasha Yar and becomes embroiled in a civil war, while also encountering Tasha's sister.

title: Reunion
synopsis: Worf's former lover, K'Ehleyr, returns with news that they have a son, and Worf must confront his enemies in the Klingon Empire.

title: Future Imperfect
synopsis: Riker awakens 16 years in the future with no memory of the intervening time and must unravel a mystery to find the truth.

title: Final Mission
synopsis: Wesley Crusher faces a life-or-death situation during his final mission with Captain Picard before leaving for Starfleet Academy.

title: The Loss
synopsis: Counselor Troi loses her empathic abilities and struggles with her identity and place aboard the Enterprise.

title: Data's Day
synopsis: Data records a typical day aboard the Enterprise, which includes helping plan a wedding and dealing with a Romulan spy.

title: The Wounded
synopsis: The Enterprise must stop a renegade Starfleet captain who is attacking Cardassian ships, threatening to reignite a war.

title: Devil's Due
synopsis: A woman claiming to be the devil incarnate appears on a planet to collect on a 1,000-year-old contract, and Picard must prove she is a fraud.

title: Clues
synopsis: The crew loses consciousness for a moment, but Data's behavior suggests that they were actually unconscious for much longer, leading to a deeper mystery.

title: First Contact
synopsis: Riker is injured and captured while undercover on a pre-warp planet, and the crew must decide how to handle the situation without violating the Prime Directive.

title: Galaxy's Child
synopsis: Geordi meets the real Dr. Leah Brahms, whose holographic version he previously fell in love with, while the ship deals with an alien baby that has mistaken the Enterprise for its mother.

title: Night Terrors
synopsis: The crew is plagued by nightmares and hallucinations as the Enterprise becomes trapped in a rift in space.

title: Identity Crisis
synopsis: Geordi and an old friend are slowly transformed into alien creatures by a mysterious parasite.

title: The Nth Degree
synopsis: After an encounter with an alien probe, Barclay's intelligence is vastly increased, leading to dangerous consequences.

title: Qpid
synopsis: Q returns and transforms the crew into Robin Hood and his Merry Men as part of a twisted game.

title: The Drumhead
synopsis: A retired Starfleet admiral conducts a witch hunt aboard the Enterprise, accusing crew members of treason.

title: Half a Life
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi falls in love with a scientist who is about to participate in a ritual suicide required by his culture.

title: The Host
synopsis: Dr. Crusher falls in love with a Trill ambassador, but complications arise when his symbiont is transferred to a new host.

title: The Mind's Eye
synopsis: Geordi is captured by the Romulans and brainwashed to become an assassin.

title: In Theory
synopsis: Data explores the complexities of human relationships by entering into a romantic relationship with a crew member.

title: Redemption, Part I
synopsis: Worf faces a personal and political crisis as civil war erupts in the Klingon Empire, and he must choose between his loyalty to Starfleet and his duty to his people.

title: Redemption, Part II
synopsis: Worf and the crew work to prevent the Romulans from interfering in the Klingon civil war, while Picard oversees the negotiations.

title: Darmok
synopsis: Picard and an alien captain must learn to communicate using metaphors after they are stranded on a hostile planet.

title: Ensign Ro
synopsis: A disgraced Starfleet officer, Ensign Ro, is assigned to the Enterprise, and she and the crew uncover a conspiracy involving the Bajorans.

title: Silicon Avatar
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters the Crystalline Entity, and a scientist obsessed with its destruction comes aboard, leading to a moral dilemma.

title: Disaster
synopsis: The Enterprise suffers a catastrophic accident that leaves the crew scattered and in life-threatening situations, forcing them to work together to survive.

title: The Game
synopsis: The crew becomes addicted to a mind-controlling game, and it's up to Wesley Crusher and a new crew member to save the ship.

title: Unification I
synopsis: Picard and Data go undercover on Romulus to find Ambassador Spock, who has gone missing while attempting to reunify the Vulcan and Romulan peoples.

title: Unification II
synopsis: Picard and Spock work together to prevent a Romulan invasion of Vulcan, while Riker investigates a mysterious theft.

title: A Matter of Time
synopsis: A mysterious time traveler claiming to be from the future visits the Enterprise, but his true intentions are unclear.

title: New Ground
synopsis: Worf's son, Alexander, comes to live with him on the Enterprise, creating new challenges for Worf as a father.

title: Hero Worship
synopsis: A traumatized boy who lost his parents in a disaster aboard a research vessel comes aboard the Enterprise and begins to emulate Data as a way of coping.

title: Violations
synopsis: Members of a telepathic species come aboard the Enterprise to exchange information, but one of them uses his abilities to violate the minds of the crew.

title: The Masterpiece Society
synopsis: The crew must save a genetically engineered society whose existence is threatened by a stellar core fragment, while also challenging their rigid social structure.

title: Conundrum
synopsis: The crew loses their memories and must figure out their identities while facing a potential threat.

title: Power Play
synopsis: Picard, Troi, and Data are possessed by alien spirits that try to take control of the Enterprise.

title: Ethics
synopsis: Worf is paralyzed in an accident and faces a difficult decision when a controversial doctor offers a risky procedure that could restore his mobility.

title: The Outcast
synopsis: Riker falls in love with a member of an androgynous species who is persecuted for identifying as female.

title: Cause and Effect
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes trapped in a time loop, repeatedly experiencing the same day and ending in the ship's destruction.

title: The First Duty
synopsis: Wesley Crusher is involved in a flight accident at Starfleet Academy, leading to a cover-up that Picard must uncover.

title: Cost of Living
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi takes Worf's son Alexander under her wing, leading to an unconventional bonding experience.

title: The Perfect Mate
synopsis: Picard becomes romantically involved with an empathic woman who is destined to be bonded to another as part of a political alliance.

title: Imaginary Friend
synopsis: A child's imaginary friend becomes real, and the crew must deal with the consequences.

title: I, Borg
synopsis: The crew rescues a lone Borg drone and must decide whether to use him as a weapon against the Borg or help him find his individuality.

title: The Next Phase
synopsis: Geordi and Ro are presumed dead after a transporter accident, but they are actually out of phase with normal reality and must find a way to communicate with the crew.

title: The Inner Light
synopsis: Picard experiences an entire lifetime in the span of minutes, living as a man named Kamin on a long-dead planet, while the crew tries to save him from an alien probe.

title: Time's Arrow, Part I
synopsis: The crew discovers Data's severed head in an archaeological dig on Earth, leading them to investigate a temporal mystery involving Mark Twain.

title: Time's Arrow, Part II
synopsis: The crew follows Data back to 19th-century Earth to stop aliens from interfering with human history, while Mark Twain becomes involved in the mission.

title: Realm of Fear
synopsis: Lieutenant Barclay faces his phobia of the transporter when he begins to experience strange visions during transport, leading to the discovery of trapped life forms.

title: Man of the People
synopsis: Troi's personality begins to change after she forms a telepathic link with a visiting ambassador, who is using her to purge his own negative emotions.

title: Relics
synopsis: The crew discovers a Dyson sphere and the long-lost Captain Montgomery Scott, who struggles to find his place in a future that has passed him by.

title: Schisms
synopsis: Several crew members, including Riker, begin to suffer from unexplained symptoms and missing time, leading to the discovery of alien abductions taking place on the Enterprise.

title: True Q
synopsis: A young Starfleet intern discovers that she has the powers of the Q and must decide whether to embrace her newfound abilities or remain human.

title: Rascals
synopsis: A transporter malfunction turns Picard, Guinan, Ro, and Keiko into children, forcing them to work together to retake the ship from Ferengi invaders.

title: A Fistful of Datas
synopsis: A malfunction in the holodeck causes several characters in a Wild West simulation to take on the appearance and abilities of Data, leading to a showdown in the program.

title: The Quality of Life
synopsis: Data discovers that a new type of robot, called Exocomps, may be sentient, leading to an ethical dilemma about their use.

title: Chain of Command, Part I
synopsis: Picard is relieved of command and sent on a secret mission into Cardassian territory, while Captain Jellico takes over the Enterprise and implements strict new protocols.

title: Chain of Command, Part II
synopsis: Picard is captured and tortured by the Cardassians, while the crew must deal with the increasingly authoritarian Captain Jellico.

title: Ship in a Bottle
synopsis: A holodeck character, Professor Moriarty, gains sentience and takes control of the Enterprise, demanding his freedom.

title: Aquiel
synopsis: Geordi becomes romantically involved with a Starfleet officer who is suspected of murder, leading to a complicated investigation.

title: Face of the Enemy
synopsis: Troi is kidnapped and surgically altered to pose as a Romulan intelligence officer as part of a covert operation.

title: Tapestry
synopsis: After being mortally wounded, Picard is given a chance by Q to change the events of his past, but he learns that his choices shaped him into the man he is.

title: Birthright, Part I
synopsis: Worf learns that his father may still be alive and held captive in a Romulan prison camp, while Data experiences dreams for the first time.

title: Birthright, Part II
synopsis: Worf discovers a hidden Klingon colony and must decide whether to stay and help them regain their honor or return to the Enterprise.

title: Starship Mine
synopsis: Picard must single-handedly thwart a group of mercenaries attempting to steal a valuable substance from the Enterprise while the ship is evacuated for maintenance.

title: Lessons
synopsis: Picard falls in love with a Starfleet officer, but their relationship is tested when they must work together during a dangerous mission.

title: The Chase
synopsis: The crew races against the Cardassians, Klingons, and Romulans to uncover an ancient secret that could reveal the origins of the humanoid races.

title: Frame of Mind
synopsis: Riker begins to question his sanity after experiencing strange hallucinations and finding himself in a mental institution.

title: Suspicions
synopsis: Dr. Crusher risks her career to investigate the mysterious death of a scientist during an experimental shield test.

title: Rightful Heir
synopsis: Worf experiences a spiritual crisis and travels to a Klingon monastery, where he encounters a clone of the ancient Klingon leader Kahless.

title: Second Chances
synopsis: The crew discovers a duplicate of Riker created by a transporter accident years earlier, leading to personal and professional conflicts.

title: Timescape
synopsis: Picard, Troi, Data, and Geordi experience time distortions while returning to the Enterprise, which is frozen in time and on the brink of destruction.

title: Descent, Part I
synopsis: Data experiences anger for the first time during an encounter with the Borg, leading the crew to a shocking discovery about their evolution.

title: Descent, Part II
synopsis: The crew battles Lore and his group of rogue Borg, while Data struggles with his newfound emotions and his loyalty to his brother.

title: Liaisons
synopsis: Picard crash-lands on a desolate planet with a hostile alien while the rest of the crew hosts two alien ambassadors with unusual tastes.

title: Interface
synopsis: Geordi uses a new interface to search for his missing mother, but he begins to experience strange and potentially dangerous visions.

title: Gambit, Part I
synopsis: Riker and the crew search for Picard, who is believed to have been killed by mercenaries, only to discover he is undercover on their ship.

title: Gambit, Part II
synopsis: Picard and Riker work together to stop the mercenaries from using an ancient Vulcan weapon with the potential to destroy entire civilizations.

title: Phantasms
synopsis: Data begins to experience disturbing dreams that lead to violent behavior, but they may hold the key to solving a mysterious problem on the Enterprise.

title: Dark Page
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi is forced to confront a deeply buried memory that threatens her life, while Deanna helps her mother navigate this traumatic experience.

title: Attached
synopsis: Picard and Dr. Crusher are imprisoned on an alien world and develop a telepathic link, leading them to confront their feelings for each other.

title: Force of Nature
synopsis: The crew discovers that warp drive may be causing irreversible damage to the fabric of space, leading to a difficult moral decision.

title: Inheritance
synopsis: Data meets a woman who claims to be his 'mother,' leading him to question his origins and the nature of his family.

title: Parallels
synopsis: Worf finds himself shifting between parallel universes, each with subtle and drastic differences from his own reality.

title: The Pegasus
synopsis: Riker is reunited with his former commanding officer and must confront the truth about a long-buried Starfleet secret involving a cloaking device.

title: Homeward
synopsis: Worf's foster brother violates the Prime Directive to save a primitive culture, leading to a moral and ethical dilemma.

title: Sub Rosa
synopsis: Dr. Crusher falls under the spell of a ghostly entity that has been haunting the women in her family for generations.

title: Lower Decks
synopsis: The number focuses on the lives of four junior officers on the Enterprise and their struggles with duty, friendship, and their careers.

title: Thine Own Self
synopsis: Data loses his memory and becomes stranded on a pre-industrial planet, where he unintentionally endangers the inhabitants with a radioactive material.

title: Masks
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters an ancient alien archive that begins transforming the ship and Data into representations of the archive's mythology.

title: Eye of the Beholder
synopsis: Troi investigates the apparent suicide of a crew member and uncovers a hidden psychic influence affecting the crew.

title: Genesis
synopsis: A medical experiment gone wrong causes the crew to de-evolve into primitive forms, and it's up to Data and Picard to reverse the process.

title: Journey's End
synopsis: Picard faces a moral dilemma when Starfleet orders the removal of Native American settlers from a disputed planet, while Wesley Crusher visits the Enterprise and questions his future.

title: Firstborn
synopsis: Worf's son, Alexander, is visited by a mysterious Klingon who tries to teach him the ways of the warrior in preparation for an uncertain future.

title: Bloodlines
synopsis: Picard learns that he may have a son and must protect him from a Ferengi adversary seeking revenge.

title: Emergence
synopsis: The Enterprise begins to develop its own intelligence, leading the crew to consider the implications of a sentient starship.

title: Preemptive Strike
synopsis: Ro Laren is sent undercover to infiltrate a Maquis cell, but her loyalty to Starfleet is tested when she becomes sympathetic to their cause.

title: All Good Things..., Part I
synopsis: Picard finds himself shifting through time, experiencing events from the past, present, and future, as he tries to solve a cosmic mystery that threatens the existence of humanity.

title: All Good Things..., Part II
synopsis: Picard's journey through time comes to a climax as he realizes that the past, present, and future are all connected, and he must work with his crew across different time periods to save the universe.
